meanings.definition: Behavior in keeping with good taste and propriety.
meanings.sent1: Her decorousness at the formal dinner impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The decorousness of his speech made him a respected leader.
meanings.sent3: The decorousness of the penguin waddling around the zoo brought a smile to the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The decorousness of the garden reflected the elegance of the mansion.
meanings.sent5: The decorousness of the ballroom was like a scene from a royal palace.

meanings.definition: The quality of being polite and well-mannered.
meanings.sent1: His decorousness in handling difficult situations earned him praise.
meanings.sent2: She always showed decorousness towards her elders.
meanings.sent3: The decorousness of the cat sitting patiently for its treat was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The decorousness of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The decorousness of the handshake sealed their agreement with respect.
